**Example 1: 设置实例属性**

 

Input: 

```
tccli ckafka ModifyInstanceAttributes --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --InstanceId 10
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Result": {
            "ReturnCode": "0",
            "ReturnMessage": "ok[no param set]",
            "Data": {
                "FlowId": 0
            }
        },
        "RequestId": "dfc46e62-73d6-4b6b-9cd8-4512259888f5"
    }
}
```
